package io.persephone.dsl.element

import io.persephone.dsl.Tag
import io.persephone.dsl.element.*

// generated by HtmlDslGenerator.kt
class STYLE : Tag(tagName = "style", selfClosing = false) {

	var media: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("media")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["media"] = it
			}
		}

	var nonce: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("nonce")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["nonce"] = it
			}
		}

	var title: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("title")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["title"] = it
			}
		}

	var type: String?
		get() = attributes.getOrNull("type")
		set(value) {
			value?.let {
				attributes["type"] = it
			}
		}

}
